alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 3:56PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Dale and west central Henry Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 356 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Newton, or near Daleville, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Midland City, Level Plains, Newton, Pinckard, Hunt Field, Waterford, Hooper Stage Field, Kirkland Crossroads, Knox Field, Mabson, Ewell, Cairns Aaf, Dale County Lake, Marley Hill, Sylvan Grove, Echo and Dean Church Road. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
